title: Nuxt Shopping
description: A very simple e-commerce site, created in Nuxt 3 with Pinia for state management and Tailwind for CSS
features: simple e-commerce application in Nuxt3
Pinia for state management
still in development
heading: Nuxt3 ecommerce

imageData.name: Nuxt 3 Shopping App Photo
imageData.alt: Image of a sample e-commece site, with the cart showing in a sidebar

title: RentDee - for Landlords - in both Thai and English
description: An app created for landlords in Thailand to report bad tenants. They can also search the database when evaluating tenant applications. I used the Vue-i18n plugin to translate the site from English to Thai
features: English/Thai translation using vue-i18n
Firebase integration
Landlords can report a bad tenant or search an applicant
Third-party auth (Google and Facebook)
heading: Internationalisation (i18n)

imageData.name: RentDee
imageData.alt: Image of RentDee Dashboard with a modal showing a green tick

title: RealSocial
description: A business website for a social media manager and web developer
features: custom CMS
made with Wagtail, in Python (Django Framework)
heading: Custom CMS in Python

imageData.name: RealSocial
imageData.alt: Image of RentDee Dashboard with a modal showing a green tick

title: Crafing with Cazz
description: A blog made in Wordpress for a dear friend who is a prolific crafting blogger and card-maker. This was customised to make posting a simple process. She wanted a lot of photos in her blog posts and links back to her existing store.
features: Blog made in Wordpress for a friend who is an avid crafter and Stampin'up demonstrator
heading: Wordpress Blog

imageData.name: Crafting with Cazz
imageData.alt: Image of a crafting website home page called Crafing with Cazz

title: Flask CoffeeShop
description: A coffee-ordering app, custom-designed in flask, for teachers to order a coffee with delivery from the Year 10 hospitality class. Authentication, ordering, keeping track of payments, order history, custom printed order labels, and more...
features: custom application built for Year 10 Hospitality students
made in Python with Flask micro-framework
includes a customer-facing ordering solution and full admin backend
chart.js was used to graph statistics
integrated gmail to send order confirmation and reset password token
Room for improvement: I became interested in Vue because I hated how the server had to refresh every time an item was added
this is being used currently and hosted privately, but I have hosted a copy on pythonanywhere so that you can test it! Click on 'register' to create a new account
heading: Python-Flask Coffee

imageData.name: Year 10 Coffeeshop app
imageData.alt: Image of the dashboard for the coffee-ordering application. Includes statistics in a colourful pie chart

title: Portfolio Site
description: I'm sure there is some kind of rule about not putting your own portfolio in your work samples, but why not?
features: portfolio site made in Nuxt 3
dynamic data from JSON
in future the data will be generated from Strapi CMS
for fun the colours of the work samples are generated randomly
enjoying using CI/CD pipeline with Netlify
heading: Nuxt3 Portfolio
